chapter.text: Sipos maxsusi Alloh taolo–Parvardigori çahonijon ast
[Parvardigoro] Tanho Turo meparastem va tanho az Tu jorī meçūem
Moro ʙa rohi rost hidojat farmo [va hamvora soʙitqadam ʙigardon]
Rohi kasone [hamcun pajomʙaron, şahidon, rostgūjon va nakukoron], ki ʙa onon ne'mat dodaī va dar zumrai ƣazaʙşudagon [jahudijon] va gumrohon [masehijon] nestand
